rules_text:
Flash
Hexproof
[i]Dread Fighter[/i] – If a creature you control would become the target of a spell or ability you don't control, you may discard a card. If you do, counter that spell or ability.
[i]Crit[/i] – Whenever Yuzu deals combat damage to a player, that player can't cast noncreature spells during their next turn.
